title: Differentiated Cells   schema
description: Cells derived from another cell type of higher potency (source), such as pluripotent stem cells differentiating into multipotent stem cells or unipotent cells.

DC_Name.title: DC_Name
DC_Name.description: The primary name for the cell as chosen by LINCS
DC_Name.schema:name: DC_Name
DC_Name.schema:description: The primary name for the cell as chosen by LINCS

items.title: DC_Alternative_Name
items.description: Other relevant names
items.schema:name: DC_Alternative_Name
items.schema:description: Other relevant names

items.title: DC_Alternative_ID
items.description: Other relevant IDs for cells
items.schema:name: DC_Alternative_ID
items.schema:description: Other relevant IDs for cells

items.title: DC_Center_Canonical_ID
items.description: LINCS DSGC-specific canonical ID. This will be assigned by a given LINCS DSGC according to its primary cell registration scheme.
items.schema:name: DC_Center_Canonical_ID
items.schema:description: LINCS DSGC-specific canonical ID. This will be assigned by a given LINCS DSGC according to its primary cell registration scheme.

items.title: DC_Relevant_Citations
items.description: List of references (with PMIDs) of relevance to cell derivation, etc.
items.schema:name: DC_Relevant_Citations
items.schema:description: List of references (with PMIDs) of relevance to cell derivation, etc.

items.title: DC_Center_Name
items.description: LINCS center using the cell
items.schema:name: DC_Center_Name
items.schema:description: LINCS center using the cell

items.title: DC_Center_Batch_ID
items.description: LINCS center-specific cell ID; Batch specific ID
items.schema:name: DC_Center_Batch_ID
items.schema:description: LINCS center-specific cell ID; Batch specific ID

items.title: DC_Provider_Name
items.description: Name of vendor or lab (provider) that supplied the cell
items.schema:name: DC_Provider_Name
items.schema:description: Name of vendor or lab (provider) that supplied the cell

items.title: DC_Provider_Catalog_ID
items.description: ID or catalogue number or name assigned to the cell by the vendor or provider
items.schema:name: DC_Provider_Catalog_ID
items.schema:description: ID or catalogue number or name assigned to the cell by the vendor or provider

items.title: DC_Provider_Batch_ID
items.description: Vendor / Provider Batch ID number; Batch or lot number assigned to the cell by the vendor or provider
items.schema:name: DC_Provider_Batch_ID
items.schema:description: Vendor / Provider Batch ID number; Batch or lot number assigned to the cell by the vendor or provider

DC_Cell_Type.title: DC_Cell_Type
DC_Cell_Type.description: Cell type of the differentiated cell. A cell type is a distinct morphological or functional form of cell. Examples are epithelial, glial etc.
DC_Cell_Type.schema:name: DC_Cell_Type
DC_Cell_Type.schema:description: Cell type of the differentiated cell. A cell type is a distinct morphological or functional form of cell. Examples are epithelial, glial etc.

items.title: DC_Known_Mutations
items.description: Mutations inherent in cell, captured explicitly; e.g. if reference is not available

branches.source: Logical Observation Identifier Names and Codes
branches.name: Mutations

items.schema:name: DC_Known_Mutations
items.schema:description: Mutations inherent in cell, captured explicitly; e.g. if reference is not available

items.title: DC_Mutation_Citations
items.description: Mutations inherent in the cells; From a reference
items.schema:name: DC_Mutation_Citations
items.schema:description: Mutations inherent in the cells; From a reference

items.title: DC_Molecular Features
items.description: Relevant molecular and morphological features of the differentiated cell
items.schema:name: DC_Molecular Features
items.schema:description: Relevant molecular and morphological features of the differentiated cell

DC_Recommended_Culture_Conditions.title: DC_Recommended_Culture_Conditions
DC_Recommended_Culture_Conditions.description: A description of the standard tissue culture conditions (media, supplements, culture dish treatment) used to maintain the cell. Description of culture dish treatment conditions would include information about coating of culture dish with fibronectin, collagen, etc, prior to cell plating. If special culture vessels are required to grow the cells, these should also be mentioned and details provided.
DC_Recommended_Culture_Conditions.schema:name: DC_Recommended_Culture_Conditions
DC_Recommended_Culture_Conditions.schema:description: A description of the standard tissue culture conditions (media, supplements, culture dish treatment) used to maintain the cell. Description of culture dish treatment conditions would include information about coating of culture dish with fibronectin, collagen, etc, prior to cell plating. If special culture vessels are required to grow the cells, these should also be mentioned and details provided.

DC_Precursor_Cell_Name.title: DC_Precursor_Cell_Name
DC_Precursor_Cell_Name.description: The name of the iPSCs that were differentiated
DC_Precursor_Cell_Name.schema:name: DC_Precursor_Cell_Name
DC_Precursor_Cell_Name.schema:description: The name of the iPSCs that were differentiated

DC_Precursor_Cell_LINCS_ID.title: DC_Precursor_Cell_LINCS_ID
DC_Precursor_Cell_LINCS_ID.description: The LINCS ID of the parent iPSC from which it was differentiated
DC_Precursor_Cell_LINCS_ID.schema:name: DC_Precursor_Cell_LINCS_ID
DC_Precursor_Cell_LINCS_ID.schema:description: The LINCS ID of the parent iPSC from which it was differentiated

DC_Precursor_Cell_Center_Batch_ID.title: DC_Precursor_Cell_Center_Batch_ID
DC_Precursor_Cell_Center_Batch_ID.description: The LINCS ID of the parent iPSC from which it was differentiated
DC_Precursor_Cell_Center_Batch_ID.schema:name: DC_Precursor_Cell_Center_Batch_ID
DC_Precursor_Cell_Center_Batch_ID.schema:description: The LINCS ID of the parent iPSC from which it was differentiated

items.title: DC_Differentiation_Protocol
items.description: The protocol that was used to differentiate the cells
items.schema:name: DC_Differentiation_Protocol
items.schema:description: The protocol that was used to differentiate the cells

items.title: DC_Related_Projects
items.description: Other projects in which the cell has been studied/used; A controlled vocabulary describing other large-scale projects in which the cell has been used (e.g. ENCODE, TCGA, ICBP, epigenomics, etc.)
items.schema:name: DC_Related_Projects
items.schema:description: Other projects in which the cell has been studied/used; A controlled vocabulary describing other large-scale projects in which the cell has been used (e.g. ENCODE, TCGA, ICBP, epigenomics, etc.)

items.title: DC_Cell_Markers
items.description: A controlled vocabulary describing the markers used to isolate / identify the cell type

branches.source: Logical Observation Identifier Names and Codes
branches.name: Cell Markers - Flow Cytometry

items.schema:name: DC_Cell_Markers
items.schema:description: A controlled vocabulary describing the markers used to isolate / identify the cell type

DC_Genetic_Modification.title: DC_Genetic_Modification
DC_Genetic_Modification.description: Stable transfection, viral transduction or any other genetic modifications (de novo mutations, translocations) that were acquired. If yes, the modifications (e.g. expressing GFP-tagged protein) should be described and appropriate references provided.
DC_Genetic_Modification.schema:name: DC_Genetic_Modification
DC_Genetic_Modification.schema:description: Stable transfection, viral transduction or any other genetic modifications (de novo mutations, translocations) that were acquired. If yes, the modifications (e.g. expressing GFP-tagged protein) should be described and appropriate references provided.

DC_Production_Details.title: DC_Production_Details
DC_Production_Details.description: This field specifies the procedure(s) by which the cells were derived from the parent/precursor cell, including genetic transformations and phenotypic selections. Citations / source information for constructs and citations for procedures should be included here when appropriate.
DC_Production_Details.schema:name: DC_Production_Details
DC_Production_Details.schema:description: This field specifies the procedure(s) by which the cells were derived from the parent/precursor cell, including genetic transformations and phenotypic selections. Citations / source information for constructs and citations for procedures should be included here when appropriate.

items.title: DC_Center_Specific_Code
items.description: LINCS center-specific coded information that can include in its format information regarding the parent / protocol used / date
items.schema:name: DC_Center_Specific_Code
items.schema:description: LINCS center-specific coded information that can include in its format information regarding the parent / protocol used / date

items.title: DC_Quality_Verification
items.description: Information pertaining to experimental verification of the cell identity; Batch-specific ID; STR profiling
items.schema:name: DC_Quality_Verification
items.schema:description: Information pertaining to experimental verification of the cell identity; Batch-specific ID; STR profiling

items.title: DC_Culture_Conditions
items.description: A description of the culture conditions that were used and are suitable for this type of cell
items.schema:name: DC_Culture_Conditions
items.schema:description: A description of the culture conditions that were used and are suitable for this type of cell

items.title: DC_Passage_Number
items.description: The number of times (if any) that the cells have been passaged (re-plated and allowed to grow back to confluency or to some maximum density if using suspension cultures)
items.schema:name: DC_Passage_Number
items.schema:description: The number of times (if any) that the cells have been passaged (re-plated and allowed to grow back to confluency or to some maximum density if using suspension cultures)

items.title: DC_Days_Post_Differentiation
items.description: The number of days after the initiation of differentiation
items.schema:name: DC_Days_Post_Differentiation
items.schema:description: The number of days after the initiation of differentiation

items.title: DC_Source_Information
items.description: This is a free-text field that provides detailed source information for this particular batch, which may include information on from whom and when the provider obtained the cells and for what purpose the cells were obtained by the end user.
items.schema:name: DC_Source_Information
items.schema:description: This is a free-text field that provides detailed source information for this particular batch, which may include information on from whom and when the provider obtained the cells and for what purpose the cells were obtained by the end user.

items.title: DC_Date_Received
items.description: This field specifies when this batch was obtained from the provider. Because YEAR-MO-DY is not always known, this field may only contain partial date information (e.g. YEAR-MO, YEAR only).
items.schema:name: DC_Date_Received
items.schema:description: This field specifies when this batch was obtained from the provider. Because YEAR-MO-DY is not always known, this field may only contain partial date information (e.g. YEAR-MO, YEAR only).

schema:name: Differentiated Cells
